"A.P.241/10/3": "...So I made an excuse for you this time."
"But even though you're a Guardian, you still need to submit to regular medical checks. You understand that, don't you Matoi?"
"You may think this is a joke, <%me>, but the same goes for you too! Don't abuse your positions as Guardians."
"So <%me> and Second's role is different to Gi and Ri."
"What happened with them that got them that?"
"It was a series of amazing battles against Darkers over a long period of time!"
"Well, I wasn't around back then, so I didn't get to see them myself."
"Hey Xiera, do you have something that holds a record of those two's achievements?"
"I would like to see what happened to ARKS after I died. I feel like I could get a good impression from just reviewing your records."
"<%me>'s experiences were so valuable, I just had to create a database to record them!"
"However, I haven't gotten round to organizing it with <%me> yet, so I'm not certain how accurate it all is..."
"So, <%me>, let's look back on your history together."
"We can sort through this information, and I'll get to see what happened after I passed. It'll be great!"
